required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Tirzepatide (LY3298176) in Participants With Obesity Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Once-Weekly Tirzepatide in Participants With Obesity Disease: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial (SURMOUNT-J)

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study is to learn more about tirzepatide in participants with obesity disease. The study will also measure how Tirzepatide affects body weight with a low-calorie diet and increased physical activity. The study will last around 72 Weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants who Achieve ≥5% Body Weight Reduction
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve ≥5% Body Weight Reduction

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Had Improvement in Obesity-related Health Problems
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who had improvement in at least 2 obesity-related health problems in participants with a baseline body mass index (BMI) ≥27 and <35 kilogram per square meter (kg/m²) or improvement in at least 1 obesity-related health problems in participants with a baseline BMI ≥35 kg/m²

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Oral Glucose Tolerance (OGTT) 2-hr Glucose (Only for Participant with Impaired Glucose Tolerance [IGT] at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in OGTT 2-hr Glucose (Only for Participants with IGT at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Fasting Glucose (Only for Participants with IGT at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Fasting Glucose (Only for Participants with IGT at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Fasting Lipids [Triglycerides (TG)] (Only for Participants with hyperlipidemia at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Fasting Lipids TG (Only for Participants with hyperlipidemia at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Hepatic Fat Fraction (HFF) (only for participants diagnosed as Non-alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease [NAFLD] by Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in HFF (only for participants diagnosed as NAFLD by MRI at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Improvements of IGT (Only for Participants with IGT at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Improvements of IGT (Only for Participants with IGT at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Improvements of Hyperlipidemia (Only for Participants with Hyperlipidemia at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Improvements of Hyperlipidemia (only for participants with hyperlipidemia at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Improvements of NAFLD (only for participants who are diagnosed as NAFLD by Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Improvements of NAFLD (only for participants who are diagnosed as NAFLD by MRI at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve ≥10% body weight reduction
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve ≥10% body weight reduction

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve ≥15% body weight reduction
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve ≥15% body weight reduction

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Absolute Body Weight
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Absolute Body Weight

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in BMI
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in BMI

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Visceral Adipose Tissue (VAT)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in VAT will be collected by single slice imaging at the umbilicus level in a supine position using computerized tomography (CT).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Subcutaneous Adipose Tissue (SAT)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in SAT will be collected by single slice imaging at the umbilicus level in a supine position using CT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in VAT/SAT Ratio
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in VAT/SAT Ratio

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve VAT <100 square centimeter (cm²) from Baseline (only for participants with VAT≥100 cm2 at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve VAT <100 cm² from Baseline (only for participants with VAT≥100 cm2 at Baseline)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Waist Circumference
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Waist Circumference

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in HbA1c

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Fasting Insulin
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Fasting Insulin

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Systolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Systolic Blood Pressure

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Diastolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Diastolic Blood Pressure

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Short Form 36 Version 2 Health Survey (SF-36v2) Acute Form Physical Functioning Domain Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in SF-36v2 Acute Form Physical Functioning Domain Score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Change in Impact of Weight on Quality-of-Life Lite Clinical Trials Version (IWQOL-Lite-CT) Physical Function Composite Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Change in IWQOL-Lite-CT Physical Function score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Euro Quality of Life Five Dimensions (EQ-5D-5L)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Euro Quality of Life Five Dimensions (EQ-5D-5L)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Have a BMI of greater than or equal to ≥27 kg/m² and <less than 35 kg/m² with at least 2 obesity-related health problems or ≥35 kg/m² with at least 1 obesity-related health problems. Health problems are IGT, hyperlipidemia, or NAFLD.
- Have a history of at least 1 self-reported unsuccessful dietary effort to lose body weight.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have diabetes.
- Acute or chronic liver disease other than NAFLD.
- Have a self-reported change in body weight >5 kg within 3 months prior to screening.
- Have or plan to have endoscopic and/or device-based therapy for obesity or have had device removal within the last 6 months.
- Have renal impairment measured as estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) <30 mL/min/1.73 m2, calculated by Japanese Society of Nephrology coefficient-modified Chronic Kidney Disease-Epidemiology equation during screening.
- Have a known clinically significant gastric emptying abnormality.
- Have had a history of chronic or acute pancreatitis.
- Have thyroid-stimulating hormone outside of the range of 0.4 to 6.0 micro units per milliliter (μIU/mL) at screening.
- Have obesity induced by other endocrinologic disorders or diagnosed monogenetic or syndromic forms of obesity.
- Have a history of significant active or unstable major depressive disorder or other severe psychiatric disorder within the last 2 years.
- Have a cardiovascular condition within 3 months prior to randomization
- Have a family or personal history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia Syndrome type 2.

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and European Union (EU), whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
